OOC: That's TWO people who aren't paying attention.

Wheeljack-X::

"She's right," Jackie points out.  "We're often called transformers 
because of this ability.  You just have to concentrate on the form 
you want to take; it's preprogrammed.  I hear some people use 
mnemonic tricks to help ..."

He looks to Nightlight to elaborate.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <silvanna2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "It's part of our nature"replied the femme while she walked to 
> towards him "You can do it too, our ancestors find the way to 
> trasnform... it's a large story"
> 
> 
> OOC: is he in Best mode?
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > He stops at the sound of her voice, he turns around and watched 
her 
> > transform."Wait a minute, how did you....you were a human...now 
an 
> > animal...HOW did you do that?"
